c74object.name: hoa.2d.rotate~
c74object.digest: A 2d ambisonic sound field rotation external
c74object.description: hoa.2d.rotate~ applies a rotation on the ambisonic sound field.

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

objarg.name: ambisonic-order
objarg.description: First argument is the ambisonic order of decomposition.

method.name: float
method.description: Set the angle of the rotation of the soundfield in radian in the last inlet at control rate. The rotation angle is anti-clockwise and wrapped between 0. and 2π.

method.name: int
method.description: Set the angle of the rotation of the soundfield in radian in the last inlet at control rate. The rotation angle is anti-clockwise and wrapped between 0. and 2π.

method.name: signal
method.digest: Array of circular harmonic signals to be rotated, rotation angle.
method.description: Array of circular harmonic signals to be optimized. Set the angle of the rotation of the soundfield in radian in the last inlet at signal rate. The rotation angle is anti-clockwise and wrapped between 0. and 2π.
